channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- MouseWheel Smooth Scroll
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- MouseWheel Smooth Scroll

item.title: CVE-2021-24852|2024-08-03T19:42:17.184Z -- unknown -- mousewheel%20smooth%20scroll
item.description: The MouseWheel Smooth Scroll WordPress plugin before 5.7 does not have CSRF check in place on its settings page, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack
